Name: Toilet Chronicles
About the game: POV: You're at a 2008 party and you need to use a bathroom. You find yourself in a public restroom. You explore the place and when you get inside of the empty cabin a guy next to your stall askes for some toilet paper. After giving him what he wants, he slides you a note with the message: 'STAY IN THE CABIN!'. What you gonna do..? When you get out of the cabin, you notice that the escape door is gone... Now you have to find out if that guy trapped you , or is he trapped with you ..? The game has: Multiple endings Strange dialogues Outdated memes In this game you can: Make choices Solve puzzles Cry Try to escape with your new partner or alone Solve the mysteries of this place Every choice you make gets you a different outcome. This is the first part of the game, other parts will come as free DLCs.
